                                                class StoreSomething<A> {
     A something;

     StoreSomething(A something) {
         this.something = something;
     }

     void set(A something) {
         this.something = something;
     }

     A get() {
         return something;
     }
}

                                                è¿™ä¸ª A å‘¢ï¼Œå¯ä»¥æ˜¯ä»»ä½•åˆæ³•çš„ Java ç±»å‹ï¼š
